txt.en: It is clear that the town of Marton has fallen to Orcs of late.

You have defeated a number of the Orkish invaders of Marton, but their numbers seem endless. This town is no longer safe, but you hope that you have avenged the farmers who were forced from their homes.
The Westfold town of Marton is now utterly occupied by violent Orc-invaders that streamed down from Isengard through the undefended gap.

You have defeated a number of the Orkish invaders of Marton, but their numbers seem endless. This town is no longer safe, but you hope that you have avenged the farmers who were forced from their homes.
Orcs can be found in the Westfold town of Marton.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs in Marton.
